movies.content: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face withhis alter-ego: the Joker.
movies.trailer: JOKER - Final Trailer - Now Playing In Theaters.mp4

movies.content: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
